entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
